location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Camp Rajpootana [Rājasthān] to the Secretary, New Bank of Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter requesting acknowledgement of receipt of moneys through supply bills and requesting that they remit a sum of money to his account with the London and Westminster Bank.The letter also enquires whether the money owed from the state of Mr Narayn Vasades has been received.
